events.name: Clean & Green Hackathon 2015
events.description:
CLEAN & GREEN HACKATHON 2015 
 The Clean & Green Hackathon 2015 (19 to 21 June) is a big step towards cultivating a collective environmental consciousness amongst those of us who call Singapore home. It's an exciting opportunity to apply your expertise and help us become a more active and gracious society, one that respects the environment and takes care of our public spaces.   
The Clean & Green Pre-Hackathon Workshop gives you the chance to gain deeper insights into the hackathon themes and apply them when designing appropriate programmes or applications that address these issues at the hackathon. 
REGISTER FOR THE WORKSHOP 
 

  
Hackathon Programme 
Coders, contribute your awesome tech skills. As for everyone else, we welcome people from all backgrounds to take part and contribute in your own way.    
• Kick-off night (Friday, 19 June): Features expert presentations to inspire you with some thought-starters and give you an overview of the challenges you can tackle. This is where you can pitch your ideas and form teams.   
• Day 2 (Saturday, 20 June): The day will be spent working with your team to develop your idea and prototype it. You'll also receive support from mentors to help you strengthen your idea and overcome roadblocks.   
• Day 3 (Sunday, 21 June): The morning starts with presentation clinics to help refine your pitch, followed by presentations to the judges in the afternoon. There's a prize pool of $6,000 to be won! 
 If you're not still not sure, why not come down for the kick-off to get a taste of what the hackathon will be like.  
 Date: Friday, 19 June (Kick-off) 
Time: 6.30pm - 9.30pm 
Venue: LaunchPad@ One-North, #04-03/04 Blk 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Singapore 139955 
 
More Info 
Find out more about the hackathon here. If you've got any questions feel free to get in touch with the hackathon organisers at hello@upsingapore.com. 
LaunchPad @ One-North04-03/04, Blk 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent Singapore 139955
